code: import axios from'axios';import TopBar from'../TopBar';import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function UploadPage(){const[status,setStatus]=useState('');const handleUpload=async event=>{const file=event.target.files;const formData=new FormData();formData.append('Image',file);await axios.post('/api/v1/images/upload',formData,{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('token')}`}});setStatus('Uploaded');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("head",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TopBar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"background",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleUpload,children:"Upload Image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:status})]})]});}export default UploadPage;
